You know when you order something and you are anxious to get it, hoping it will be as nice as you want it to be?? This Micoson Womens Top was that for me! I was giddy when I opened the package - it is a perfect top that can be worn for so many different purposes. It's very well-made, the material is very soft and comfortable, the fabric is stretchy so it's very forgiving, the style is slightly fitted, and the neckline and design make it much more interesting than a plain long sleeved knit top. I wear this under suit jackets at work, under cardigans, by itself, you name it!! It's a great top, and I'm going to buy other colors!
The material was great and fit was perfect.

This blouse is darling.  It fits well and I think anyone would look nice in it.  It was very soft, and laid very well.  It came down to mid hip which was nice.  Looked wonderful with a pair of black jeans.  Dress it up or down.  With it being polyester, it will be easy to wash and wear.

Ordering clothes online is risky because they all look great on the models but sometimes fabric is cheap or not soft. I can confirm that is not the case here! I was this on cold in the gentle cycle and dried in the dryer. Fabric held up well and is soft. It also fits/lays well, the fabric has a good weight to it and it seems like good quality.

This is a well made blouse.It can be worn loose or tucked in.I would call the fabric mid weight. It laundered beautifully in cold water and I hung it to dry without any wrinkling at all. The sizing is accurate.Either jeans are black slacks will be my go to with this top.I feel it would be appropriate work attire for all but very conservative businesses.
I got this shirt for work. I like that it can dress up or dress down. The fabric is soft and cut is flattering. It’s no high end shirt, but is cute on.

评论概述: Material is soft, colors are bright
评论详情: I got this shirt for my mom. It is really soft and comfortable. The colors are nice and bright. She really likes it.

评论概述: The pattern is just ok in person
评论详情: The pattern looked better on the picture but overall this is a nice top. I like that the lines and v-neck are slimming. The material is just ok but with a solid bottom you can make this top look decent.

The material on this shirt is so soft and comfy to wear. The fit is perfect. It’s loose without being too frumpy or baggy looking. I love the design as well. It will be perfect for work with nice pants or can be dressed down with jeans.
Soft knit, nice fit for me, a 10/12.

This Micoson Dressy Top for Women is actually dressier than I expected. It's a t-shirt type of material but the design and cut are very classy. It's a fabulous way to look and feel great at the same time. The cut is extremely flattering too. This will definitely be a go-to item in my closet. It has my highest recommendation.
This shirt fits great and the size fits as expected. The fabric and construction are both great quality.

I got this blouse in red. The color is stunning; love the red shade. The fit is perfect and very flattering on my curvy frame. The cotton in the shirt balances out much of the plastic feel from the shirt having so much polyester in it. Typically I avoid synthetic fabric shirts because I sweat enough and plastic causes stinky smells. I'm thrilled to have this red one. Plus, I've received several wonderful compliments each time I wear it.

I like the shirt as it fits and the material is nice.  The overall front of it leaves me a little confused.  It's like an outer seam instead of a solid or finished front.  I'll wear it as it fits well and isn't tight in the shoulders but I can see the front seam being an issue down the line.

I thought this was a different type of fabric (talk about not reading description) but I am glad it's this kind of fabric and not what I was thinking.  The fabric is very soft both to the touch and on your skin. Very forgiving and stretchy for those days when you are having a potluck at work and you know you will eat more than you should (I mean, you are probably not like me but just in case).  The color is precisely what I saw on the screen and what I wanted. I wear long sleeve through the entire Summer and this is perfect to cover my arms without feeling too hot but I know it will be perfect for the Fall as well.  No tag -- thankfully!

While I really do like the shirt I received, the listing photo for this version is deceiving.  The "Apricot - Black Floral" looks white in the photo, but the actual shirt is more cream/off-white.  It also appears to be more of a wide V-neck, and the actual shirt has a much narrower V.  In hindsight, I also wish I had ordered a solid color because I know that after a few washings of this shirt, the black will fade and it will not be as attractive as it looks now because it is knit.  I was expecting more of a chiffon-like, flowing material because that's what the shirt looks like in the listing.All that aside, the fit is wonderful.  The knit is soft and comfortable.  I hope I can get lots of wear from it because it is perfect for work.

I'm thrilled with my Micoson blouse! As a 40 DD it's incredibly comfy and stylish, perfect for both work and casual outings. The V-neck and pleats add a flattering touch, and the loose fit pairs well with everything from jeans to skirts. The fabric is soft and breathable, making it a fantastic addition to my fall wardrobe! I love that as a neutral the black goes with many different pants that I already own.

I purchased the apricot-green top. Overall, I'm quite pleased. The descriptive color "apricot" is much more accurate than the photo, which looks like a bright, crisp white. This is more cream and green. But I still like it.  It's a great weight for warmth in the cooler months or layering in the cold months.  It's not tight through the shoulders, back, or armpits. Plenty of flexibility. Very comfortable and soft. And the length is perfect in both the front and back.  Only drawback is that it wrinkles easily. However, the wrinkles aren't severe.  I'd buy this again in a variety of colors and patterns. This top would be great as a work office look or a casual vibe.

评论概述: Dressy and casual at the same time
评论详情: Great cut and great fit. I love this blouse. It looks great with dress pants and with denim. I appreciate the neckline, perfect for a necklace. Soft fabric that is machine wash. It dried perfectly on a hanger.

评论概述: Light, cheerful yet dressy multicolored top
评论详情: I ordered this Micoson Women Top Dressy Casual under the strict supervision of my wife, but I reserved the choice of color, and did I hit a home run! So let me start here:  I ordered the multicolored and it is striking the combination of colors, the cheerfulness it adds, and although the colors seem to be on the high tone scale, no, they are not. My wife likes the size, which she says is full, meaning that there’s no need to add or subtract, the fabric which is very light and has a great tactile feeling (60% Polyester, 35% Cotton, 5% Spandex), and the finish. No run away stitching, well finished, and the V-like collar is exactly centered. My wife likes it. I am happy.
